verbose_text: The reduced function of CYP3A4 in the elderly leads to a more important role of CYP2D6 in metabolizing metoprolol as a form of compensatory mechanism.39 Therefore, the weak inhibition of CYP2D6 may increase the blood concentration of metoprolol further in the elderly population.
evidence: CYP3A4 in the elderly leads to a more important role of CYP2D6 in metabolizing metoprolol as a form of compensatory mechanism.39 Therefore, the weak inhibition of CYP2D6 may increase the blood concentration of metoprolol
